name: Pixiv.net - Hide Objects
description: Requires the user to read the comments in the code. This CSS is packed with selectors, and by default, hides those objects. How to use: If you want to restore a particular object, then delete the code - it's either a line, or a small block of text. Important: I strongly suggest you save your customizations in a new style, otherwise your edits will be undone if you download an update.
additional_info:
Doesn't prevent advertisements from loading. Get an adblocker for that purpose and save yourself some needless data transfer. [ clean cleaner clutter remove hide junk clear pixiv ] 2016-02-03
